item.title: French stocks up 0.6% despite political upheaval; European markets trade higher
item.description: European markets traded higher Tuesday, with investors keeping an eye on political upheaval in France this week.

item.title: Microsoft faces £1 billion lawsuit in UK for allegedly overcharging rival cloud firms' customers
item.description: Microsoft was accused of unfairly overcharging customers of rival cloud companies including Amazon, Google and Alibaba Cloud in a U.K. lawsuit filed T...

item.title: French lawmakers to hold no-confidence vote against embattled Barnier government on Wednesday
item.description: The motion will be debated at 4 p.m. on Wednesday, expected to be followed by a vote later in the evening.

item.title: Asia-Pacific markets trade higher after key Wall Street benchmarks hit record highs
item.description: Asia-Pacific markets traded higher on Tuesday, tracking gains on Wall Street after the S&P 500 and the Nasdaq Composite rose to new records.
